name: Lewmoth And The Sacred Lamps
description:
Play as Lewmoth, a black moth on his journey to find the Sacred Lamps, to bring light back to Mothland. Lewmoth is plagued by his Arch nemesis, King Mono. King Mono and his legion of bugs and arachnids wish to stop Lewmoth’s quest, keeping Mothland in darkness forever.

The game is currently in an early access state, so expect bugs/issues. It would be a huge help to us if you could send feedback or bugs that you encounter to either my twitter (@dev_dwarf) or my discord (TheKingDwarf#3925).

Thanks For Playing!
